mapper.sql: ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, ORG_TYPE, DISTRICT_CODE, UP_ORG_CODE, TELEPHONE, ADDRESS, NOTE, LEADER, IS_LEAF, IS_DEPT, SAMPLE_NAME, IS_LIANGFA_LEADER, SI_ORG_ID, SI_ORG_PID, INDUSTRY_TYPE, INDUSTRY_NAME, ORDER_NO, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, POLICE_TYPE, ORG_PATH,ACCEPT_DISTRICT_CODE

distinct

mapper.insert: insert into ORGANISE (ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, ORG_TYPE, DISTRICT_CODE, UP_ORG_CODE, TELEPHONE, ADDRESS, NOTE, LEADER, IS_LEAF, IS_DEPT, SAMPLE_NAME, IS_LIANGFA_LEADER, SI_ORG_ID, SI_ORG_PID, INDUSTRY_TYPE, INDUSTRY_NAME, ORDER_NO, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, POLICE_TYPE, ORG_PATH,ACCEPT_DISTRICT_CODE) values (#{orgCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{districtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upOrgCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isLeaf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isDept,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sampleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isLiangfaLeader,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{siOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siOrgPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{policeType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{acceptDistrictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update ORGANISE
ORG_CODE = #{record.orgCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_NAME = #{record.orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_TYPE = #{record.orgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISTRICT_CODE = #{record.districtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UP_ORG_CODE = #{record.upOrgCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TELEPHONE = #{record.telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE = #{record.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEADER = #{record.leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_LEAF = #{record.isLeaf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_DEPT = #{record.isDept,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SAMPLE_NAME = #{record.sampleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

INDUSTRY_NAME = #{record.industryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ACCEPT_DISTRICT_CODE = #{record.acceptDistrictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ORGANISE set ORG_CODE = #{record.orgCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_NAME = #{record.orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_TYPE = #{record.orgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISTRICT_CODE = #{record.districtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UP_ORG_CODE = #{record.upOrgCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TELEPHONE = #{record.telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{record.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEADER = #{record.leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_LEAF = #{record.isLeaf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_DEPT = #{record.isDept,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SAMPLE_NAME = #{record.sampleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_LIANGFA_LEADER = #{record.isLiangfaLeader,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SI_ORG_ID = #{record.siOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SI_ORG_PID = #{record.siOrgPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDUSTRY_TYPE = #{record.industryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDUSTRY_NAME = #{record.industryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_NO = #{record.orderNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_USER = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, POLICE_TYPE = #{record.policeType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_PATH = #{record.orgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCEPT_DISTRICT_CODE = #{record.acceptDistrictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ORGANISE
ORG_NAME = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_TYPE = #{orgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISTRICT_CODE = #{districtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UP_ORG_CODE = #{upOrgCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEADER = #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_LEAF = #{isLeaf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_DEPT = #{isDept,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SAMPLE_NAME = #{sampleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_LIANGFA_LEADER = #{isLiangfaLeader,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SI_ORG_ID = #{siOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SI_ORG_PID = #{siOrgPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDUSTRY_TYPE = #{industryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDUSTRY_NAME = #{industryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
POLICE_TYPE = #{policeType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_PATH = #{orgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCEPT_DISTRICT_CODE = #{acceptDistrictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ORGANISE set ORG_NAME = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_TYPE = #{orgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISTRICT_CODE = #{districtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UP_ORG_CODE = #{upOrgCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEADER = #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_LEAF = #{isLeaf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_DEPT = #{isDept,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SAMPLE_NAME = #{sampleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_LIANGFA_LEADER = #{isLiangfaLeader,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SI_ORG_ID = #{siOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SI_ORG_PID = #{siOrgPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDUSTRY_TYPE = #{industryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDUSTRY_NAME = #{industryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, POLICE_TYPE = #{policeType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_PATH = #{orgPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCEPT_DISTRICT_CODE = #{acceptDistrictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select a.* ,(select count(*) from post_ where org_id= a.org_code)as postNum, (select count(*) from district t where t.up_district_Code=a.district_Code) as districtNum, (select count(*) from organise where up_org_code = a.org_code) as deptNum from organise a where
up_Org_Code = #{id}
A.DISTRICT_CODE like #{districtCode}||'%'
and is_dept=0
order by org_code
select * from organise t where district_code like #{value}||'%'

select b.* from (select * from organise where
org_code = #{orgCode}or (up_org_code =#{orgCode} and is_dept=1)
org_code in (select o.org_code from organise o,task_bind t where t.assign_target=o.org_type and t.proc_def_id=#{procDefId} and t.task_def_id=#{taskDefId} and o.district_code like #{districtCode}||'%' )
) b where exists( select * from task_assign a where a.dept_id=b.org_code and b.is_dept=1 and a.proc_def_id=#{procDefId} and a.task_def_id=#{taskDefId}) or b.is_dept=0

select * from organise n where is_dept=0 and (org_code=#{orgCode} or up_org_code=#{orgCode}) and district_code like #{districtCode}||'%' and org_type in
#{listItem}
SELECT * FROM ORGANISE n where is_dept=0 AND n.ORG_TYPE = '5' AND district_code =#{districtCode}
select o.org_code, o.org_name from organise o, user_ u where (o.org_code = u.org_id or o.up_org_code = u.org_id) and u.user_id = #{userId} and o.is_dept = 0
SELECT O.ORG_NAME || '(' || A.ORG_NAME || ')' FROM ORGANISE O, (SELECT A.ORG_NAME, A.UP_ORG_CODE FROM ORGANISE A WHERE A.ORG_CODE = #{acceptUnit}) A WHERE O.ORG_CODE = A.UP_ORG_CODE

SELECT T.DISTRICT_CODE,T.ORG_CODE, T.ORG_NAME, T.UP_ORG_CODE, T.ORG_TYPE,T.IS_LEAF FROM ORGANISE T WHERE T.ORG_TYPE = #{orgType} AND T.DISTRICT_CODE = #{districtCode} AND T.IS_DEPT = 0 ORDER BY T.ORG_CODE ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE ORGANISE T SET T.IS_LEAF = #{isLeaf} WHERE T.ORG_CODE = #{orgCode}
UPDATE ORGANISE T SET T.UP_ORG_CODE = #{upOrgCode} WHERE T.ORG_CODE = #{orgCode} AND T.DISTRICT_CODE= #{districtCode}
UPDATE ORGANISE T SET T.PATH= #{path} WHERE T.ORG_CODE = #{orgCode} AND T.DISTRICT_CODE= #{districtCode}
mapper.select:
select * from organise t where org_type=3 and is_leaf=0
and district_code =#{districtCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE ORGANISE T SET T.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} WHERE T.ORG_CODE = #{orgCode} OR T.UP_ORG_CODE=#{orgCode}
mapper.select: select * from organise where org_type=#{orgType} and district_code = (select district_code from organise where org_code=#{orgCode})
SELECT * FROM ORGANISE oe WHERE oe.district_code = (select o.district_code from ORGANISE o where o.ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) AND oe.org_type = 5 AND oe.up_org_code = -1
SELECT * FROM ORGANISE WHERE ORG_CODE = #{code}

SELECT ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, ORG_TYPE, DISTRICT_CODE, UP_ORG_CODE, IS_LEAF, IS_DEPT,ORG_PATH FROM ORGANISE WHERE IS_DEPT=0 AND UP_ORG_CODE=#{upOrgCode} AND DISTRICT_CODE =#{districtCode}
AND ORG_TYPE >1

SELECT
FROM ORGANISE O WHERE O.ORG_CODE=(SELECT U.ORG_ID FROM USER_ U WHERE U.USER_ID=#{inputer})
SELECT ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, ORG_TYPE, DISTRICT_CODE, UP_ORG_CODE, IS_LEAF, IS_DEPT,ORG_PATH FROM ORGANISE
SELECT * FROM ORGANISE WHERE DISTRICT_CODE = #{districtCode} AND POLICE_TYPE = 2 AND IS_DEPT = 0
SELECT * FROM ORGANISE WHERE UP_ORG_CODE = #{upOrgCode} AND IS_DEPT = 1
